src:
Mengenang Gol Spektakuler Alfin Lestaluhu Bersama Timnas Indonesia U-16
01 Nov 2019, 06:06 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Dunia sepak bola Indonesia tengah diselimuti duka menyusul kabar meninggalnya pemain Timnas Indonesia U-16, Alfin Lestaluhu pada Kamis (31/10/2019).
Alfin Lestaluhu yang juga sempat jadi korban Gempa Ambon, sempat dirawat secara intensif di Jakarta. Pemain kelahiran 2004 ini menghembuskan napas terakhirnya di Rumah Sakit Progres, Sunter, Jakarta sekitar pukul 22.00 WIB.
Nama Alfin Lestaluhu sendiri menjulang saat ikut membawa Timnas Indonesia U-16 menduduki posisi ketiga Piala AFF U-16 2018.
Alfin juga turut berperan membawa Indonesia lolos ke putaran final Piala Asia U-16 2020 yang akan digelar di Bahrain. Di ajang kualifikasi, Alfin mencetak gol spektakuler saat Indonesia mengalahkan Filipina 4-0 di Grup G.
Alfin Lestaluhu mencetak gol ketiga dalam pertandingan yang digelar di Stadion Madya Senayan, Jakarta (16/9).
text:
Commemorating the Spectacular Goal of Alfin Lestaluhu with the Indonesian National Team U-16
Nov 01 2019, 06:06 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesian soccer world is covered with sorrow following the news of the death of Indonesian U-16 national team player, Alfin Lestaluhu on Thursday (10/31/2019).
Alfin Lestaluhu, who was also a victim of the Ambon earthquake, was treated intensively in Jakarta. The player who was born in 2004 breathed his last at the Progress Hospital, Sunter, Jakarta at around 22:00 WIB.
The name Alfin Lestaluhu himself loomed when he helped bring the Indonesian U-16 national team in third place in the AFF U-16 2018 Cup.
Alfin also played a role in bringing Indonesia to qualify for the 2020 U-16 Asian Cup final which will be held in Bahrain. In the qualifying event, Alfin scored a spectacular goal when Indonesia beat the Philippines 4-0 in Group G.
Alfin Lestaluhu scored the third goal in a match that was held at the Madya Senayan Stadium, Jakarta (16/9).
